sentences.english: For instance, Christmas gifts and toys, they are exported around the world.
sentences.chinese: 例如，聖誕禮品和玩具，它們是出口世界各地。

sentences.english: Experience is a gift being given.
sentences.chinese: 履歷是一份禮品，我們正在被付與着。

sentences.english: The gift can be something made or bought from a gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 能很輕鬆的禮物或買一家禮品店。

sentences.english: A book was given to her as a birthday present.
sentences.chinese: 她哥哥送給她一本書作爲生日禮品。

sentences.english: In the holiday between the relatives and friends mutually congratulates , the gift, the expression is mutually friendly.
sentences.chinese: 節日裏親友之間相互祝賀，互贈禮品，表示友好。

sentences.english: OPENCASE is a professional business gifts company, one of the best business gifts companies in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海歐普凱商務諮詢有限公司是一家專業的禮品公司。

sentences.english: B. His long service with the company was acknowledged with a present.
sentences.chinese: 向他贈送禮品以感謝他長期來對公司的服務。

sentences.english: And by the way, the most crowdy place in the whole museum is the gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 整座大英博物館裏，就屬禮品店裏的人最多。

sentences.english: People “have got money in their hand if they’ve got a gift card,” Mr. Ullman said.
sentences.chinese: 人們“只要受到禮品卡就會有錢”Ullman說。
禮品籃都是我們的業務。

sentences.english: I'm taking Thursday off to do some Christmas shopping.
sentences.chinese: 我週四要休假去買一些聖誕禮品。

sentences.english: The Company to undertake the design and production of various high-level commemorative gift table.
sentences.chinese: 本公司承接設計及生產有紀念性的各種高級禮品表。

sentences.english: Send to the small gift to express affection, promote the comity .
sentences.chinese: 送小禮品以表達感情，增進友誼。

sentences.english: Flowers and fruits are always fit presents.
sentences.chinese: 花及水果總是合適的禮品。

sentences.english: We oohed and aahed over our handiwork as the presents were exchanged.
sentences.chinese: 在交換禮物時爲對方親手做的小禮品不停地歡呼叫好。

sentences.english: No matter the size of gifts, and use crystal will pass on the friendship between different conditions.
sentences.chinese: 無論禮品大小，用上水晶便傳上了不一樣的友誼情。
